definition: to watch/to look carefully at
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
variant of 察[cha2]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: 13 consider well her ramparts, view her citadels, that you may tell of them to the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 细看他的外郭，察看他的宫殿，为要传说到后代。

sentences.english: India is an observer state to the Shanghai Co-operation Organisation.
sentences.chinese: 印度是上海协作组织的察看员国。

sentences.english: Looking through the Akashic records is like leafing through an infinite mental photo album.
sentences.chinese: 察看阿卡西记录就像翻阅一本无限的精神相册一样。

sentences.english: 2Test me, O Lord , and try me, examine my heart and my mind;
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，求你察看我，试验我，熬炼我的肺腑心肠。

sentences.english: If I sin, then thou markest me, and thou wilt not acquit me from mine iniquity.
sentences.chinese: 我若犯罪，你就察看我，并不赦免我的罪孽。

sentences.english: He observes the sons of men; his eyes examine them.
Shawn and Walt were around the front of the church looking at the bell tower while I was exploring the back area.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩和沃尔特在教堂前部检查灯塔而我在后面察看。

sentences.english: Go to the ant, you sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise.
sentences.chinese: 懒惰人哪，你去察看蚂蚁的动做，就可得聪慧。

sentences.english: The shoemaker carefully examined the leather before starting to cut out the uppers.
sentences.chinese: 鞋匠仔细察看了这张皮子以后才开始裁剪鞋帮儿。

sentences.english: He sees not just images and activities but discerns thoughts and motives.
sentences.chinese: 他不单察看我们的言行举止，更鉴察我们的心思意念。

sentences.english: Fierce with pain the monster turned back his head to view the wound.
sentences.chinese: 疼痛使得那怪物暴躁不安，它扭过头来察看伤口。

sentences.english: It could view “click-through rates” as a measure of ad quality.
sentences.chinese: 通过察看“点击率”可以作为判断广告质量的标准。

sentences.english: Go to the ant, you sluggard, consider her ways and be wise!
sentences.chinese: 懒惰的人哪，你去察看蚂蚁的动作，就可得智慧。

sentences.english: I looked through the telescope and saw a small boy with a bag over his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我透过望远镜察看并看到肩上扛着一个包的小男孩。

sentences.english: Please review and contact Bank of China, Beijing Branch, Beijing to collect the LC.
sentences.chinese: 请察看并联系中国银行北京分行接收这个信用证。

sentences.english: Some officials will look over our factory this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 本周五一些官员将察看我们的厂子。

definition: to visit/to go to see what's going on
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to check/to investigate/to probe (into)
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to inquire about
to inspect/to examine
to patrol/to make a tour/to inspect/to scan with one's eyes
unusual condition/something odd/strange shape
to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
to investigate
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to recognize/to identify
to reconnoiter/to explore/to survey
to search/to look for
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
everywhere
